solution_line_template: When Parker added two more dumbbells to the setup, he increased the weight by {added_num_dumbbells}*{dumbbell_weight} = <<{added_num_dumbbells}*{dumbbell_weight}={added_weight}>>{added_weight} pounds.
The dumbbells that Parker used to do his exercise weigh a total of {added_weight}+{initial_total_weight} = <<{added_weight}+{initial_total_weight}={total_weight}>>{total_weight} pounds.
